title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, February 14, 2022
description: On this Valentine's Day, we remember Zelda Sayer and F. Scott Fitzgerald, a couple so famous in their day they were known by their first names, Scott and Zelda.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this Valentine's Day, we remember Zelda Sayer and F. Scott Fitzgerald, a couple so famous in their day they were known by their first names, Scott and Zelda.
itunes:summary: On this Valentine's Day, we remember Zelda Sayer and F. Scott Fitzgerald, a couple so famous in their day they were known by their first names, Scott and Zelda.
